title: Respond to Landowner Complaint
description: A landowner calls to complain that a pipeline maintenance crew left a gate open on their property.

tasks.description: Log the landowner's complaint, capturing their name, address, and the details of the incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new complaint case is created in the system.

tasks.description: Check work order records to identify which crew was working at that location on the specified date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system identifies the specific maintenance crew responsible.

tasks.description: Contact the crew supervisor to address the issue and dispatch someone to close the gate immediately. Follow up with the landowner to confirm resolution.
tasks.expected_outcome: The issue is resolved promptly, and the resolution is communicated back to the landowner.
